quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Energy and persistence conquer all things.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Remember not only to say the right thing in the right place, but far more difficult still, to leave unsaid the wrong thing at the tempting moment.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If passion drives you, let reason hold the reins.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Never leave till tomorrow that which you can do today.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Chains of habit are too light to be felt until they are too heavy to be broken.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: When you put your hand to the plow, you can't put it down until you get to the end of the row.
author: Alice Paul

quote: Stop worrying about missed opportunities and start looking for new ones
author: I. M. Pei

quote: When you put your hand to the plow, you can't put it down until you get to the end of the row.
author: Alice Paul

quote: Originality is the essence of true scholarship. Creativity is the soul of the true scholar
author: Nnamdi Azikiwe
